### 9. Third-Party Integrations

#### Blog Platform Integration
- Integrate a blog platform like Contentful or Sanity.io.

#### Analytics and Tracking
- Set up analytics and tracking using tools like Google Analytics or Mixpanel.

#### Social Media Sharing and Authentication
- Enable social media sharing and authentication features for user convenience.
